name: DUChatServer Demo
description: Demo of integrating your backend with Diuit API

APP_ID.description: Your Diuit APP ID. You can get it from Diuit API dashboard (https://developer.diuit.com/dashboard)

APP_KEY.description: Your Diuit APP KEY. You can get it from Diuit API dashboard (https://developer.diuit.com/dashboard)

KEY_ID.description: Your Diuit KEY ID. You can get it from Diuit API dashboard (https://developer.diuit.com/dashboard)

PRIVATE_KEY.description: The private key downloaded when you clicked `Generate Key`. Open it and then copy&past here.

PLATFORM.description: The platform string of the device. Must be one of the following:"gcm", "ios_sandbox", "ios_production".
